statements: SELECT * FROM compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT company_name, location FROM compliance_data;
SELECT company_name, last_inspection_date FROM compliance_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM compliance_data WHERE location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT id, company_name FROM compliance_data ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT company_name, location FROM compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM compliance_data WHERE last_inspection_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT company_name, location, compliance_status FROM compliance_data WHERE location LIKE '%York%' ORDER BY last_inspection_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, compliance_status FROM compliance_data WHERE last_inspection_date < '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM compliance_data WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp' AND location IN ('New York', 'Los Angeles') ORDER BY last_inspection_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM environmental_compliance_data
SELECT id, company_name, location FROM environmental_compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = TRUE
SELECT company_name, location FROM environmental_compliance_data WHERE location LIKE '%California%'
SELECT * FROM regulations ORDER BY compliance_deadline DESC
SELECT regulation_name, description FROM regulations
SELECT * FROM environmental_compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT company_name, location FROM environmental_compliance_data WHERE location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT * FROM environmental_compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = FALSE ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT company_name, compliance_status FROM environmental_compliance_data WHERE location = 'New York' AND compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT id, company_name, compliance_status FROM environmental_compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceAgency;
SELECT id, name, code FROM ComplianceAgency ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM Facility WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM Facility WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT id, facility_id, agency_id, date FROM ComplianceRecord WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM Facility WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT name, location FROM Facility WHERE compliance_status = FALSE;
SELECT name, location, compliance_status FROM Facility WHERE id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT * FROM ComplianceRecord WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT Facility.name, ComplianceAgency.name FROM Facility INNER JOIN ComplianceRecord ON Facility.id = ComplianceRecord.facility_id WHERE ComplianceRecord.status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM Environmental_Compliance_Data;
SELECT company_name, location FROM Environmental_Compliance_Data ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Standards WHERE standard_name = 'ISO 14001';
SELECT company_name, compliance_status FROM Environmental_Compliance_Data WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant';
SELECT regulation_name, description FROM Regulations WHERE regulation_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM Environmental_Compliance_Data WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant';
SELECT company_name, location FROM Environmental_Compliance_Data WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM Regulations WHERE description LIKE '%environmental%';
SELECT inspector_name, findings FROM Inspections WHERE inspection_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT standard_name FROM Standards WHERE standard_name ILIKE '%emission%';
SELECT * FROM environmental_compliance_data;
SELECT company_name, address, city, state, country FROM environmental_compliance_data ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT regulation_name, standard_name FROM regulation_standards WHERE standard_id = 1;
SELECT violation_description, violation_date FROM violations WHERE company_id = 3 ORDER BY violation_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, compliance_status FROM environmental_compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM environmental_compliance_data ORDER BY company_name ASC, state DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT company_name,city,country FROM environmental_compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY company_name LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM fines WHERE fine_amount > 1000 ORDER BY fine_amount DESC, fine_date DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT violations.violation_id, violations.violation_description, inspections.inspector_name FROM violations INNER JOIN inspections ON violations.company_id = inspections.company_id ORDER BY violations.violation_date DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT company_name, address, city, state, regulation_name, standard_name FROM environmental_compliance_data INNER JOIN regulation_standards ON environmental_compliance_data.id = regulation_standards.standard_id ORDER BY company_name ASC LIMIT 5
